title: 2005 Montes Folly
wine_description: A deep ruby red color. On the nose, lively black ripe fruit, hints of dark chocolate and a subtle toastiness. In the mouth, the wine is robust, concentrated, velvety and dense. Tobacco and vanilla notes arrive on the finish.

title: 2006 Stag's Leap Wine Cellars FAY Cabernet Sauvignon
wine_description: A fragrant nose of ripe blackberry and raspberry along with notes of sweet fig, cinnamon and violet. The palate is elegant with silky tannins and a core of rich fruit with a hint of crème brulee. The wine finishes with a lingering berry pie character.

title: 2020 Domaine Bernard-Bonin Meursault 1er Cru 'Genevrières' | Vivino
wine_description: Domaine Bernard-Bonin Meursault 1er Cru 'Genevrières' is a White wine. Made from Chardonnay. This wine has 24 mentions of oaky notes (butter).

title: 2013 Tenuta di Trinoro Toscana Rosso
2010 Luca Nico by Luca Malbec
wine_description: It has dark red colour with deep purple shades. Dense and concentrated but never loses its ability to exude the red and black fruits and spice that are the true expression of Malbec in Mendoza.

title: 2006 Stag's Leap Wine Cellars CASK 23 Cabernet Sauvignon
wine_description: The heart of Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars is undoubtedly the estate vineyards and extraordinary care is taken to assure that a wine’s aroma, flavor, and texture convey a sense of place. As the difference between a good wine and a great one is often in the details, our viticultural practices are driven by extreme, even obsessive, attention to detail. Throughout the growing season and all the way through harvest, vines are cared for to achieve their optimum maturity level and ensure the ‘signature’ of the terroir is expressed to its fullest. The goal is to create wines of classic beauty — wines with balance, complexity and harmony. From the beginning, the Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars vision has been to create wines that speak to the place from which they come. These goals are realized in our three limited-production Estate-Grown Cabernet Sauvignons – CASK 23, S.L.V. and FAY—which are crafted from vineyards surrounding the winery. The same classic style of the Estate wines is also expressed in the Napa Valley Collection, which consists of three wines: AVETA Sauvignon Blanc; KARIA Chardonnay and ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon.

title: 2018 Domaine G. Roumier Chambolle-Musigny
wine_description: This is a straightforward, deliciously fruity wine with rich, juicy fruit flavors. Fresh raspberry flavors provide a sweetness to dominate the soft tannins.

title: 2021 Egon Müller - Scharzhof Scharzhofberger Riesling Kabinett
wine_description: It boasts grassy, lime aromas and plenty of tart, citrusy, green-apple fruit. It’s a wine with piercing acidity and fresh, sweet fruit.

wine_description: The wine is very closed, but has all the usual characteristics of the designation: beautiful fruit, nice roundness, good persistence.

title: 2020 Egon Müller - Scharzhof Scharzhofberger Riesling Spätlese
wine_description: Exotic aromas of tropical fruit and honey tangerines introduce this intensely fruity yet elegantly structured spätlese. The palate is powerfully concentrated, all the while, being lifted by a spray of citrus acidity and crushed minerals. It’s unabashedly sweet with fruit, yet finishes remarkably dry.

title: 2018 Domaine des Bosquets Gigondas La Colline
wine_description: An intense color. A rich and expressive nose, already generously covered the small black berries, liquorice, ripe plum and a touch of élégeante rosewood and cental. On the palate, this wine is first large, rich, full and this awesome side ends while savory mineral length, refreshing the finish and équilbrant by finesse of tannins. Potential: 15 more ...

title: 2017 Franz Hirtzberger Riesling Beerenauslese | Vivino
wine_description: Franz Hirtzberger Riesling Beerenauslese is a Dessert wine. Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 2015 Felton Road Block 5 Pinot Noir
wine_description: It has deeply fragrant nose offers sweet florals, cane fruits and exotic perfume. Signature lavender aromatics are at once bright and restrained in this vintage. Broad ranging red fruits and vibrant sandalwood are presented over a crystalline structure and elegant framework. Mocha undertones lend intriguing hints of noble power with soft and feathery tannins offering persistence and poised balletic precision.

title: 2019 Méo-Camuzet Clos de Vougeot Grand Cru
wine_description: Is this a wine which expresses the Cistercian rigour which gave birth to it? No, its image is rather that of a refined gentleman: the grapes mature early here, but still give wines of great finesse, with a lace-like texture, which lines the palate, with superb length.

title: 2019 Domaine Marquis d'Angerville Volnay 1er Cru 'Clos des Ducs' Monopole
2022 Domaine de la Vougeraie Vougeot 1er Cru 'Le Clos Blanc de Vougeot' (Monopole)
wine_description: It has wonderful nose of ripe peach and toast, considerable viscosity, indeed almost rich on the palate with core of integrated oak and enough citrusy acidity to balance.

title: 2013 Andrew Januik Stone Cairn
wine_description: This beautiful violet colored wine delivers a variety of complex aromas including candied cherries, currants, and chocolate. The front of the palate shows nice sweetness and fruit which transitions into a well-structured mid-palate that displays more earthiness as well as the subtle notes of new French oak. The finish is quite long and brimming with the bright acidity and dark fruit that is indicative of Red Mountain. Enjoy this wine from now until 2030.

title: 2020 Domaine Gros Frère et Soeur Clos de Vougeot Grand Cru
2008 Bethany GR Reserve Shiraz
1999 Domaine Bertagna Vougeot 1er Cru 'Clos de la Perrière' Monopole
wine_description: Elegant and delicate. Black fruits aromas, truffle and spices. Intense witgh grilled almond and underwood hints, with a nice minerality. Tanins are delicate and silky which gives a very nice character to this wine.

title: 2022 Domaine Comte Georges de Vogüé Musigny Grand Cru (Cuveé Vieilles Vignes)

title: 2021 Egon Müller - Scharzhof Scharzhofberger Riesling Auslese
wine_description: Opening notes of smoke and dried herb blow off to reveal layers of ripe tangerine, honey, lemon and lime on this aromatic medium-sweet Riesling. The palate is lusciously fruity, with rich, ripe flavors of mango and peach, but cut by piercing citrus acidity that penetrates. The finish lingers on and on.

title: 2022 Domaine G. Roumier Morey-Saint-Denis Premier Cru Clos de La Bussière
N.V. Ruinart Blanc de Blancs Brut Champagne
wine_description: The chardonnay is the very soul of Ruinart. The grape, mainly harvested from the Côte des Blancs and Montagne de Reims terroirs, is at the heart of all our cuvées. Ruinart Blanc de Blancs, intensely aromatic, is the Ruinart Taste emblem. The palate is both precise and clean as the wine delivers a radiant balance between roundness and smoothness.

title: N.V. Billecart-Salmon Blanc de Blancs Brut Champagne Grand Cru
wine_description: APPEARANCE: The fine mousse of delicate bubbles elegantly accompanies the glints of its gold colour. AROMA: A cuvée that will surprise you with its almond aromas mixed with those of fruits of white flesh. PALATE: The complexity and power of its vinosity characterise the evolution of this Blanc de Blancs, a cuvée specially appreciated and distinguished for its fresh, elegant finish.

title: 2015 Stags' Leap Cabernet Sauvignon
wine_description: Cabernet Sauvignon is aromatically beautiful, introducing itself with alluring notes of dark, red fruit and a peppery spice. The aromatics and oak are seamlessly integrated together in this juicy wine, showcasing the ideal amount of blueberry and blackberry flavors.

title: 2021 Belle Glos Clark & Telephone Vineyard Pinot Noir
wine_description: Belle Glos Clark & Telephone Pinot Noir is a dry red wine from the Santa Maria Wine Valley in California, known for its complexity of flavors and mild, velvety tannins. With every glass, you can expect deep oaky notes of chocolate and tobacco that are perfectly balanced with hints of cherry, blackberry and spices. This wine pairs perfectly with beef, veal, game, deer and poultry, so it’s great for pairing with rich, meaty dishes. Although according to some of our community, it also pairs well with lighter snacks such as almonds or olives, or in place of a dessert after dinner thanks to its fruity nose. This bottle from Belle Glos Winery is widely loved by the Vivino community, with its 2018 vintage coming in third out of all Californian Pinot Noir wines in the United States. At Vivino, we’re passionate about helping our community choose the right wine for them. Find out more about Belle Glos Clark & Telephone Pinot Noir, including pricing, vintages and reviews below.

title: 2011 Clos Rougeard Saumur Champigny
1989 Domaine de La Chapelle Hermitage La Chapelle Rouge
wine_description: Intense ruby red, limpid and bright. Highly complex, distinguished nose, revealing the great finesse. Black fruits, sweet spices and, ultimately, finely woody. It is shaped by nature, the sun and the rain. That's why every year, this wine is unique. Discover, vintage by vintage, that gave us this land.

title: 1992 Pommery Brut Cuvée Louise Rosé Champagne | Vivino
wine_description: Pommery Brut Cuvée Louise Rosé Champagne is a Sparkling wine. Made from Chardonnay. Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 2009 Deutz Cuvée William Deutz Millesimé Brut Champagne
wine_description: Intensely seductive, with a bright golden hue, this is a generous wine both in its structure and flavours. These are fresh, suave and well built. its true panache lies in the lingering memory of its taste

title: 1985 Domaine de La Chapelle Hermitage La Chapelle Rouge
wine_description: Intense ruby red, limpid and bright. Highly complex, distinguished nose, revealing the great finesse. Black fruits, sweet spices and, ultimately, finely woody. It is shaped by nature, the sun and the rain. That's why every year, this wine is unique. Discover, vintage by vintage, that gave us this land.

title: 2008 M. Chapoutier Ermitage Le Pavillon
wine_description: Colour: Deep garnet red, with purple highlights. Nose: First : tar, slighly closed and smoky. Second : raspberry, blackberry, walnut. Mouth: Complex, strong attack, it is a round, elegant wine, soft with a long aftertaste of liquorice and tobacco.

title: 2015 Domaine Marquis d'Angerville Volnay Champans 1er Cru
wine_description: The wine is very closed, but has all the usual characteristics of the designation: beautiful fruit, nice roundness, good persistence.

title: 2010 Auguste Clape Cornas
2006 E. Guigal Ermitage Ex-Voto
wine_description: Eye : Deep dark ruby colour with mauve tints. Nose : Black fruits, leather, liquorice, coffee flavour and oriental spices. Palate : Powerful attack with richness and an important tannic structure. This wine expression fully the terroir trough its finesse and the strength of its tannins. Overall : Great ageing potential, structured and concentrated with a rare intensity of flavour and colour.

title: 2005 Mitolo Savitar Shiraz
wine_description: A dark red with a vibrant purple hue, the aromatics are bright, elevated combinations of cassis, tobacco and spice-box yet with freshness and vitality. The palate is full bodied, meaty and complex well integrated oak and tannin provide elements of structure to the wine and it finishes with impressive length.

title: 2019 Prophet's Rock Retrospect Pinot Noir | Vivino
wine_description: Prophet's Rock Retrospect Pinot Noir is a Red wine. This wine has 26 mentions of red fruit notes. Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 2006 Domaine Leflaive Puligny-Montrachet 1er Cru Les Pucelles
2012 Raveneau Chablis Premier Cru 'Butteaux'
2019 Clearview Estate Endeavour Chardonnay | Vivino
wine_description: Clearview Estate Endeavour Chardonnay is a White wine. This wine has 29 mentions of oaky notes (oak). Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 2005 Clos Rougeard Saumur Champigny
2012 Domaine Gros Frère et Soeur Clos de Vougeot Grand Cru
2004 Achaval-Ferrer Finca Altamira Malbec
wine_description: Blackberry, black plum, violet, cassis and a touch of leather on the nose. Silky on the palate, fresh acidity and refined tannins. Marked layers of espresso with a long floral very expressive finish.

title: 2010 Delas Les Bessards Hermitage
wine_description: To the eye, the color is dark red, shiny and deep. The nose, a big race, exhale sweet scents of black fruit and violet. The Hermitage "Les Bessards" present in highly concentrated fruity mouth . This wine impresses with its tannic structure particularly dense, rich and perfect balance.

title: 2017 Tua Rita Keir
2009 Jacquesson Champ Cain Extra Brut Champagne Grand Cru 'Avize'
2019 Craggy Range Aroha Te Muna Road Vineyard Pinot Noir
wine_description: It has bright dark cherry colour. Beautifully lifted nose of dark rose, spiced red fruits, fresh bark and tar. Elegantly composed on the palate with lovely fruit density carried long by fine acidity and velvet like tannins slowly unfolding for a long and dry finish.

title: 2020 Von Winning Pechstein GG
2009 Domaine Yves Gangloff La Barbarine Côte-Rôtie
wine_description: Plump, hedonistic and aromatic wine, with classic notes of black olive, bitter chocolate, plums and dried herbs. Serious tannic depth.

title: 2022 Egon Müller - Scharzhof Scharzhofberger Riesling Kabinett
wine_description: It boasts grassy, lime aromas and plenty of tart, citrusy, green-apple fruit. It’s a wine with piercing acidity and fresh, sweet fruit.

title: 2018 Domaine des Bosquets Gigondas Le Lieu Dit
wine_description: An intense ruby-purple color. A fresh and expressive nose, already generously covered the small red berries, sour cherry, cherry, sweet licorice, plum and kirsch. On the palate, this wine is air, spherical, but full and rich. Suave tannins present but melted by a long aging.

title: 2006 Stag's Leap Wine Cellars S.L.V. Cabernet Sauvignon
wine_description: Offers generous aromas of cocoa powder, graphite, blackberry and baking spice. A broad, silky entry fills the mouth with dark berry fruit and dark chocolate flavors. The palate is rich and concentrated with round tannins that are present but enjoyable and inviting.

title: 2015 Von Winning Kirchenstück GG
wine_description: A luscious flavour with pronounced fruits set in a compact background which simply radiates excitement and generates a mood for more. It is often compared with the nave of a church, impressive, intense and yet easy to understand

title: 2014 Domaine Dujac Clos de la Roche Grand Cru
region: Clos de la Roche Grand Cru

title: 2005 St Hallett Old Block Shiraz
wine_description: Old Block Shiraz is a beautifully balanced and elegant wine. It opens with a fine fruit burst followed by a dense dark fruit core and a long even finish. Full bodied with a textural mouthfeel, it possesses immaculate oak and fruit flavour integration and a supple persistent finish.

title: 2017 Mon Cheval LeChar Pinot Noir | Vivino
wine_description: Mon Cheval LeChar Pinot Noir is a Red wine. Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 2009 M. Chapoutier Ermitage Les Greffieux
wine_description: Colour: very deep red garnet. Nose: small black fruits, ink and black pepper. Taste: Very tannins, licorice

title: 2006 Bethany GR Reserve Shiraz
2022 Egon Müller - Scharzhof Riesling 'Le Gallais' Wiltinger Braune Kupp Kabinett
2005 Château de la Tour Vieilles Vignes Clos Vougeot Grand Cru
2020 Von Winning Ozyetra
2006 Vincent Dauvissat Les Clos Chablís Grand Cru
wine_description: Pine tree, forest and mineral aromas on the nose. Perfumed and sweet almond marzipan-flavored fruit on the palate. Lush and seemingly sweet, yet dry with a sneaky power and tremendous elegance, and some kumquat on the finish.

title: 2015 Pegasus Bay Prima Donna Pinot Noir
2021 Millton Clos de Ste. Anne The Crucible Syrah | Vivino
wine_description: Millton Clos de Ste. Anne The Crucible Syrah is a Red wine. Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 2023 Rockburn Eleven Barrels Pinot Noir | Vivino
wine_description: Rockburn Eleven Barrels Pinot Noir is a Red wine. Check its rating and reviews from the world’s largest wine community.

title: 1999 Auguste Clape Cornas
2007 Rare Champagne Rare Brut Rosé Champagne (Millésimé)
2018 Felton Road Block 5 Pinot Noir
wine_description: It has deeply fragrant nose offers sweet florals, cane fruits and exotic perfume. Signature lavender aromatics are at once bright and restrained in this vintage. Broad ranging red fruits and vibrant sandalwood are presented over a crystalline structure and elegant framework. Mocha undertones lend intriguing hints of noble power with soft and feathery tannins offering persistence and poised balletic precision.

title: 2021 Domaine G. Roumier Chambolle-Musigny
wine_description: This is a straightforward, deliciously fruity wine with rich, juicy fruit flavors. Fresh raspberry flavors provide a sweetness to dominate the soft tannins.
